sentences.sContent: He vowed to achieve certain objectives before the end of his presidency.
sentences.sCn: 他立誓要在他的总统任期结束之前实现某些目标。

sentences.sContent: the best way to accomplish your objectives
The degree program has two main objectives.
sentences.sCn: 该学位课程有两个主要目标。

sentences.sContent: Managers should set specific performance objectives for their teams.
sentences.sCn: 经理应该为自己的团队制定明确的绩效目标。

sentences.sContent: The main objective was to improve children’s knowledge of geography.
sentences.sCn: 主要目的是要增长儿童的地理知识。

sentences.sContent: A clear objective was set and adhered to.
sentences.sCn: 定下了明确的目标并坚持到底。

sentences.sContent: One of your first business objectives should be to get your own office.
sentences.sCn: 你的首要工作目标之一应该是拥有自己的办公室。

synos.tran: 目的；目标；[光]物镜；[语]宾格

phrases.pCn: 客观知识；客观认识；客观熟悉

words.tran: 使具体化，使客观化；体现

trans.tranOther: something that you are trying hard to achieve, especially in business or politics
